overview: Patrick Jenevein entered the energy sector in 1986 when he founded The Nolan Group, the general partner of Tang Energy Group, to build a business developing, installing, and operating natural gas processing and gathering facilities, and developing oil and gas reserves. The Nolan Group currently provides managerial, technical and financial expertise and services to various asset-holding companies, including Tang Energy Group. Mr. Jenevein also co-developed an 80MW, gas-fired, co-generation plant in Wichita Falls, Texas. Mr. Jenevein chairs Tang’s Board of Directors and has led Tang’s growth since its founding. Mr. Jenevein’s extensive experience in the clean energy business in China and the U.S. uniquely position Tang to benefit from the growing business of energy diversification and wise stewardship of the environment.
